column4: does any one have any idea how to fix "association took too long" errors?
are you using WPA wireless? is that where the error is happening?
one sec and i will paste bin the last 30 lines of /var/logs/daemon.log
first though, is this a wireless conneciton error? if not wehre / when is the error happening, and what Ubuntu Version are we talkign about here?
ubuntu 10.04 netboook remix, and yes it is a wlan problem, now that the darn thing (mostly) works
there's a bug in the wpasuplicant aps, a couple actually.
ther is also a kernel regression that makes getting broadcom 43xx wireless chipsets working ...painful
ubuntu 10.04 netbook remix, on a dell 910 netbook
ok, so this is a native install on your Dell Notebook yes?
not much I can do on this one im affraid, if it's working, yet intermitently, they your setup and config is correct, and like I said earlier, there's a couple of bugs in the WPA applicaitons.
any ideas where i can get the nightlys?
I dont use them, too many troubles as it is, but hold on, will have a look.
